outputs.output_descr:
Baseline data collected, information and analyses about vulnerabilities, resilience and adaptive capacity are full compiled.  
- The PAD developed and finalized through participatory approach, with explanation of the institutional arrangements, budgeting, monitoring and evaluation plan;
- Co-financing raised and confirmed officially and
- The PAD widely endorsed by all the concerned parties.

project_descr: Projet de renforcement de la resilience et adaptation aux changements climatiques dans les secteurs agraires et hydriques (PIMS 3977)-PPG
